sense.gloss: ridge of earth between rice fields
ridge between grooves in threshold or lintel
ridge (in field), row of raised earth when planting crops
(raised) footpath between rice fields, ridge between rice fields
waterhyssop (Bacopa monnieri), brahmi, thyme-leafed gratiola, water hyssop, herb of grace, Indian pennywort
